actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States in order to establish equitable duty rates for sodium bicarbonate.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to impose a duty on sodium bicarbonate.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States in order to establish equitable duty rates for sodium bicarbonate.
